Recommended Tools & Reading

Here are some tools, texts, and websites that have helped shape my thinking about film, criticism, and technique.

🛠️ Tools

  • ShotDeck — A searchable database of high-quality film stills.
  • Frame.io — Collaborative platform for video review and feedback.

📚 Books

  • In the Blink of an Eye by Walter Murch
  • Sculpting in Time by Andrei Tarkovsky
  • Film Art: An Introduction by Bordwell & Thompson

🌐 Links

  • Letterboxd — Follow my viewing log and reviews.
  • The Criterion Channel — Streaming service with a great collection of films and extras.

If you’d like to suggest additions, feel free to email me at trevor@filmframefocus.com.
